Dxm is a controlled substance and you have to be 18 to purchase it.
OmG doNt Do trIple C's thEYre daNgERouS

I was completely blacked out on my first and only 1000mg trip. My friend said told me that I tried telling him my northern was taking a shower even though he was right next to me. I tried to get in the shower myself at 4 in the morning. I started folding dirty towels and trying to put them away because I thought my mom told me to do laundry. And then I tried to go out my front door to get the pizza. I have no memory of any of this
Yeah. Just drink water and you'll be fine though. It doesn't cling to your fat cells like thc does so it doesn't stay in very long
No problem man. Just beware that high doses can show up in a drug test for PCP a couple days after the trip.

When I was still pretty new a would have near panic attacks from sensory overload and being in the back of a small car but music on full blast with headphones was a good way to calm me down. I'd recommend finding songs you like in 8d format, it'll blow your kind if you're high
It won't have any long term effects if you take a break. Some people recommend about a month but 1-2 weeks is fine as long as you don't binge again

It certainly scared the shit out of me during the trip. Luckily I was able to remind myself that weed can't kill you and it's only temporary. I keep trying to replicate that trip now that I'm more experienced with drugs all around but I don't think I will

When you take dxm it slows down your central nervous system which is responsible for voluntary breathing so it probably feels like you're out of breath. It also raises your heart rate and body temp so your body needs more oxygen to keep going. This is normal though and nothing to worry about if you don't binge.

My first two times with weed I didn't get high and I was using a dab pen which is a lot more potent than bud. Then my third time I got so high I thought I was in hell and stuck in an eternal time loop and if I stopped moving around I'd cease to exist.

Mighty wind, gear, and caustic are really good. Mine dice isn't that good but could be useful for early game. Modified electric dice can be pretty good as well as ice for the slow, but that's about it. A tip I can give you for combat is fill your board before you start combining unless you need to. Only upgrade your damage dice too.
There isn't really a good deck you can make from these cards. Just keep grinding alliance until you unlock more

I've hated this drug every single time I've done it, but yet I still do it For me it is a way of getting out of my depressed mentality and just have a break for a couple hours. I'd also convince myself that eventually I'm gonna enjoy the drug, I just have to keep trying it. I always hope I see some cool shit which I never do. Very easy to get addicted to this drug which is why 99% of people still use it.

He snatched it out of my pocket, ran to the bathroom and locked it so he could chug the bottle. Then when it hits him he starts annoying everybody by calling every couple seconds and even snuck out of the house (loud as fuck too) and met up with us at a park and was just acting like a dumbass all night
